name: Missile Moon
description:
In this game you are a blue rocket escaping from the red missiles. This is of course a "prototype", so there are no affects, but at least there's sprite art unlike my last game jam game witch you can visit at https://chnif.itch.io/bug-out.

| * | Controls | * |

Right Arrow Key | Turn Right

Left Arrow Key | Turn Left

| * | How to Play | * |

As you orbit the moon you must use the trail left by the thrust of the rocket to destroy the missiles. There is no clear effect of the missile being destroyed because of the time restraint.

A Trijam #6 Game
